title: Welcome to the Latest Edition of
The Justia Insider
message: Welcome to the August 2021 Edition of the Justia Insider! The time for company updates and announcements has come. However, we highly encourage you to be extremely careful with your health. Please continue to stay at home and observe social distancing. While some people are already fully vaccinated, others are not. In the interim, do not let your guard down, and stay safe by all means.
